title: RIOT PLZ
body: RIOT MY GAME KEEPS ON CRASHING FOR NO REASON AND I KEEP ON GETTING PUNISHED FOR IT. PLZZZ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Rineyy asked some great questions that I'd like to know as well in order to help you out.  Toss some more details this way, and I'll be happy to help.  Let me know!

1. Where / when do your crash?
2. When did this start?
3. How frequently does this occur?
